column72: At his Great Room in Pall Mall
column79: Multiple sellers, including Churchill and Purling A catalogue of a capital and valuable collection of Italian, French, Flemish and Dutch pictures, some fine bronzes, a pair of beautiful porphry vases, several drawings, views taken in Barbadoes and Donminica, framed and glazed, the genuine property of a man of fashion. The pictuers comprise several of the works of the most admired masters.
